_header: In this wise fell the case / As God would by His grace
_description: ‘De resurrectione domini’, the last portion of the metrical Life of Christ

BLAdd39996.First Lines:
In þis wise fel þe caasAs god wolde by his
                    grace…
BLAdd39996.Last Lines: …And many moo saiden nayIt myght not be by no way
BLAdd39996.Editions:
Stine,  Shirley Packard,
                        ed.  
             “The Metrical Life of Christ: Edited from MS BM Additional
                39996.” 
         Diss. University of Pennsylvania, 1962 [DA 23.1010].
